summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and prescribing fees for Fire Department permits for hazardous materials and processes, second acceptance test inspections of fire protection equipment, devices and systems, Fire Prevention Division inspections or plan review outside regular business hours, compliance inspections by the Fire Prevention Division, and the review and examination of plans by the Fire Prevention Division, and filing of code alternates, repealing Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 22.602 (Ordinance 110594), and adding a new Chapter 22.602 to the Seattle Municipal Code.
note: Fire Code Permit and Inspection Fee Ordinance
